channel.title: ~^~Sour's Help Thread~^~
channel.description:
Welcome To Sour's Help Thread.
I'm SourSoul, Welcome To My Help Thread. Earlier This Year There Was A Mass Deletion By Mod Taharok. During Looking Through The Forum, I've Seen Stupid, Idiotic Short Questions In Threads That Could Cause Another Mass Deletion. I've Been Wondering What I Could Do To Help The Forum To Avoid Another Mass Deletion. I Came Up With A Thread That Can Help You With All Your Questions On Private Servers. I'm Giving You A 90% Chance That I Can Answer Your Questions.
If You Are UnLucky And That 10% Has Been Giving To You, You Might Be In Luck. I'm Lucking For Some More Helpers To Help Me With This Thread.
If You Would Like To Be Part Of Sour's Help Thread Please Email SourSoul@Hotmail.co.uk With The Following Information:
Your Mopar Forum Name Your [u]First[/u] Name Why You Would Like To Be Part Of The Help Thread Proof Your Higher Than A C+ Coder
Thankyou For Your Time.

item.title: ~^~Sour's Help Thread~^~

yea i need help wi its testscape k its got a health glitch anychance u know how 2 fix thers like there helath keeps going up i mean whts the point iof the game if its goin 2 happen so i need ur help plz

There’s a thread already on this post …Use the search button!
